casebody.data:
OUR LADY OF GUADALUPE SCHOOL, Petitioner,
v.
Agnes MORRISSEY-BERRU. No. 19-267. Supreme Court of the United States. March 23, 2020

The motion of Virginia, et al. for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument is denied. The motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument is granted.
